comment: Professor Jones gives a real-world feel of working in teams. Some group members didn't contribute, and I hope grades reflected that. His tests are straightforward and lectures are clear. He encourages independence, which I appreciated, and he's very accessible outside of class for questions. A solid professor who prepares you for the real world.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: IET 3620***  Professor Jones was such a great professor this semester. This class is extremely straightforwad as there were 3 exams, 3 homework assignments, and 2 discussion posts. It couldn't get any more simple than this so if you want a smooth class I recommend this one.

There are 3 exams and a final exam. Exams are easy and gives 1 assignment a week. He is enthusiastic about project management and just wants to lead a new gen of project managers into the world. Meaning not a tough grader. Quizzes are extra cred.

Great professor for Project Management! Great lectures, attendance optional, and optional quizzes (for extra credit). Very straightforward assignments and tests. The professor was also easy-accessible outside of class. Highly recommend!

Project Management with Professor Jones was a simple class. He was kind and I enjoyed listening to his lectures. I would take him again. As long as you use the text book, answer the questions on the homework, take all quizzes (which are not required) and pay attention this class is an easy A and he is a great professor.
Very easy and straight forward class for project management. If you do not pass it is because your lazy.
